sys_remote_update_set.description: Bulk Insert Question Choices - All the components are new and nothing out of box was altered. This adds a records producer and related variables. Also adds a button on variable table for ease of usage.

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_8e72b8c5dba40b00d8ccd421cf9619b5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Add Options">2cd06b44db28c700d8ccd421cf96194e</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>AO-AutoPopulate-URL-Parameters</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
	//Use the 'getParameterValue' function below to get the parameter values from the URL
	var variable = getParameterValue('sysparm_u_variable');
	if (variable) {
		g_form.setValue('u_variable', variable);
	}
}

function getParameterValue(name) {
	var url = document.URL.parseQuery();
	if (url[name]) {
		return decodeURI(url[name]);
	} else {
		return;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-11 05:01:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>8e72b8c5dba40b00d8ccd421cf9619b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AO-AutoPopulate-URL-Parameters</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8e72b8c5dba40b00d8ccd421cf9619b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-11 05:01:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
